Comment: From the article - they picked quotes from 3 Republican residents who voted for Trump.  None of these are Chicago Resident voices with any serious backing.  They're Fox News contributors / talking heads because they're African American.  Heck, one of them spoke at the RNC in Milwaukee last year.    In a city of millions, yes, you could find someone that has these opinions, but they specifically chose people who've likely been paid for their appearances on Fox News in the past to get quotes.

Also, one of the Pritzkers are on the Harvard Board of Governors and Trump singled her out when he addressed the letter requesting them to bend the knee.  This is a billionaire feud.
